page.title: 13A SATURDAY IN CHURCHDOWN
page.content: On Saturday 15th June 1985 I got up early unlike most Saturdays.I had toast and honey and a glass of milk for breakfast.Next I called for my friend and we came home and washed my dad's car. We washed it with soap then we hosed it down.Then my friend went home and my dad took us to Grandma's who lives near us in Churchdown.We stayed there for lunch and then helped Granma in her garden. At 3:30 we went home and I practised my piano and clarinet ready for my lesson.Then I had tea:beans on toast and ice-cream.After tea I watched T.V. and then I fed the goldfish.Then I brushed my teeth and put on my pyjamas and at 7:30 I went to bed.
